name: The Blobs (Arj783)
description:
THE BLOBS

Hello! The blobs is a card based battle game made by me, Arj783. It was originally made for a school project but I decided to post it! For help on how to play the game, here's a google doc:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aAY5e4QZ-EYxkTP_HaCnyCBPIzL-xwBLgHpjIstWX0o/...

You can also access the doc by clicking the help button in the game. All designing and programming credit goes to me, however the music was made by AdhesiveWombat.

Good luck, and enjoy!                                                                                                                                                    - Arj783

P.S. If you don't mind, try my other game, color rush!
